title: Mcp-Server-Amazon-Bedrock
description: An MCP server integrating with Amazon Bedrock's Nova Canvas model to generate high-quality images from text descriptions.
creator: zxkane

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS access key ID with Bedrock permissions.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your AWS secret access key with Bedrock permissions.

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region where Bedrock services are available (default: us-east-1).
